about_the_game:
Story



Meet Mei, a spirited young girl from Korea whose jungle expedition takes a tantalizing turn when she stumbles upon an ancient tomb. In the depths of this tomb lies a lustful ghoul whose desires extend far beyond the grave, igniting a forbidden romance that transcends life and death.

Description

Welcome to the captivating and thrilling visual novel "Sex Ghoul Fling"! Immerse yourself in a world of passion, romance, and adventure, where unexpected plot twists and exciting moments await.

Key Features:


  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in breathtaking artwork and animations that bring the story to life.
  • Forbidden Romance: Experience a love story that defies the boundaries of mortality and morality.
  • Captivating Story: Follow Mei's journey as she navigates the mysteries of the ancient tomb and discovers the true nature of the ghoul.
  • Interactive Gameplay: Engage with the story through immersive interactions and dynamic scenes.
  • Steamy Scenes with Animations: Explore passionate encounters between Mei and the ghoul, brought to life with sultry animations.
  • Multiple Endings: Explore different paths and outcomes as you uncover the secrets of the tomb and Mei's relationship with the ghoul.
Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with passion, danger, and romance in "Sex Ghoul Fling"!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexual violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, sexual acts.
It does not contains  drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
All characters are over the age of 20.

legal_notice: Legal Information: All images and artworks featured in the game are objects of intellectual property and are protected by copyright. The developer holds full and exclusive rights to commercially utilize the aforementioned artworks provided by the artist, within the context of creating and distributing this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Sex Ghoul Fling🧟❤️

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join Mei on a journey of discovery and desire in "Sex Ghoul Fling." Will you succumb to the forbidden temptations of the ghoul, or will you forge a path to freedom amidst the shadows of the ancient tomb?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
